content: मासिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [म से भवः ठञ्] {@--1@} Relating to a month. {@--2@} Happening every month, monthly. {@--3@} Lasting for a month. {@--4@} Payable in a month. {@--5@} Engaged for a month. --कं A funeral rite or Śrāddha performed every newmoon (during the first year of a man's death); पितॄणां मासिकं श्राद्धमन्वाहार्यं विदुर्बुधाः.
